intro.text: TryBet is a universal and multifunctional gambling platform where you can fully enjoy all modern entertainment online. The unique feature of the service is that it combines an online casino and a full-fledged bookmaker. This means that you can spin the reels of your favorite slots, play instant and crash games, sit down at virtual tables with card games. And if you are more into sports, then go to the sports betting section.
The site offers an intuitive menu, an easy-to-use interface, a quick registration procedure, secure payment methods and much more. You can play on computers or mobile devices.
Before registering, Canadian players should know that customers from Ontario are not allowed to register on this site. If you are from another province, you can easily create an account.

Registration Process.text: To become a full-fledged client of TryBet Casino, be able to make deposits, play for real money and collect winnings after successful bets, you will need an account. It will take you only a few minutes to create one.

items: go to the main page of the official website;
click on the Registration button in the upper right corner;
in the new window, select the country (Canada) and currency (CAD);
create a username for your account;
create a secure and complex password;
confirm that you are 18 years old and agree to the terms and conditions of the casino;
click on the Create Account button to complete the procedure.

Registration Process.text: After that, a letter with a link will be sent to the specified email address.

Login.text: Authorization on the site requires even less time and effort. To do this, you only need to go to the main page and fill in 2 fields - username and password. If necessary, click on the "Forgot your password?" button if you cannot log in to your account. You will be sent step-by-step instructions for restoring access.

One of the mandatory requirements for new online casino clients is to go through the identity verification procedure. To successfully complete verification, you will need to register, log in to your account, fill out a page with personal data, and also send a scanned copy of your documents.

You will find the required list of documents and the rules for providing copies in the corresponding section in your personal account. These requirements are relevant for all clients who want to withdraw winnings. The casino strictly adheres to the KYC principles.

Deposit Methods.text: The casino offers loyal requirements for the minimum deposit, which is from 10 CAD. Canadian gamblers can use various payment systems:
Transactions are carried out instantly. There is no need to pay a commission for replenishing the game balance.

Withdrawal Methods.text: After successful verification of the account, clients of this online casino get the right to withdraw winnings. To do this, you can use the following payment instruments:
The minimum withdrawal amount is 20 CAD for e-wallets and cards, or from 100 CAD for bank transfers. Application processing time from 3 hours to 1-3 banking days.

Advantages and Disadvantages.text: To give an objective assessment of an online casino, every client from Canada must be sure to know all the main advantages and disadvantages of the service. This way you can make sure that the presented platform meets your requirements and ideas about the best online casinos.

Games Available to Play.text: Despite the lack of a live dealer games section, the TryBet service offers many interesting opportunities and game projects. Most of them are available in demo mode. To do this, simply click on the Try It button when selecting a game.
If you prefer sports betting and like to follow various sporting events, making a forecast for them, this site will be an excellent choice due to access to numerous lines and high odds.

Undoubtedly, the largest group of games is slots. You can easily choose thematic categories, enabling you to select classic slots, bonus buy games, Megaways, new games, the popular games on the site, etc. Additionally, you can search conveniently by provider, too.

Here's an outstanding assortment of thrilling games. It is a fantastic way to occupy your leisure time while displaying your talents in games like video poker, roulette, baccarat, Sic Bo, blackjack, and more.

In the "Other Games" section, you can find a large selection of interesting and exciting projects. For example, you should definitely play Aviatrix, test your strength and luck in Keno, and enjoy other original online games. All of them, like slots, are available in demo mode. Therefore, the first few rounds or attempts can be played without risking your own bankroll.
It is important to understand that about 50% of all attention on the site is paid to sports betting. Therefore, Canadian players can enjoy several types of bets at once:

Choose the appropriate section to make your own forecast and compete for big prizes thanks to high and fair odds. In the eSports betting section, you can also follow online broadcasts of various competitions absolutely free of charge.

Bonuses and Promotions.text: Compared to some of its competitors, TryBet does not have the most diverse bonus program. However, here you are guaranteed to receive generous welcome bonuses and take part in some seasonal and special promotions. Keep an eye on the updates in the Promotions section so as not to miss anything interesting.
All newly registered players who prefer casino games can receive a triple welcome bonus:

items: 100% on the first deposit up to 500 CAD and 40 free spins;
100% bonus on the second deposit up to 300 CAD and an additional 20 free spins;
100% bonus on the third deposit up to 200 CAD and another 10 free spins.

Bonuses and Promotions.text: You can use all free spins in the Aviatrix game. To activate this triple offer, the amount of each deposit must be at least 10 CAD.
If you prefer sports and like to bet on various sporting events, then choose the appropriate welcome bonus. Here you will also find a triple reward:

items: 100% bonus for the first deposit up to 500 CAD;
100% bonus for the second deposit up to 300 CAD;
100% bonus for the third deposit up to 200 CAD.

Bonuses and Promotions.text: You can use all the received cash rewards for free bets on your favorite sports. Activating the offer is quite simple. To do this, when making a deposit, select the sports bonus and deposit at least 10 CAD to your balance.

If you play on this gambling platform, then a draw in a match does not mean boredom and losses. You can receive additional rewards. If your bet does not win, and the match ends 0:0, all lost bets that meet the criteria of the promotion will be returned to the player in the form of a free bet.

If you are ready to create a coupon for 3 or more predictions for various sporting events, you can get an impressive additional prize. The more games in one coupon, the higher the bonus percentage. For example, for 3 predictions in a coupon you will receive a 3% bonus. For 10 events - 30%, and for 21 events or more - 100% bonus from the net winnings.

Support.text: The site provides 2 main channels of communication with technical support representatives:
Surprisingly, there is no FAQ section on the casino and bookmaker website. But you can use the useful self-exclusion function to combat gambling addiction.

FAQ.text: From what age can I play in this online casino?
According to the rules of the casino, the player must be at least 18 years old.
How to get a welcome casino bonus?
Register, deposit 10 CAD and select a casino bonus.
How to get a welcome sports bonus?
After registration and when depositing 10 CAD or more, select a sports bonus from the options presented.

Software Technologies.text: The Canadian online casino cooperates with leading providers of gaming software. This allows you to play your favorite gaming projects from such studios as NetEnt, Microgaming, PlayNGo, Red Tiger, 7777 Gaming, BoldPlay and many others.

Security.text: The gambling platform and bookmaker uses a comprehensive system to ensure protection and security. It includes solutions such as SSL encryption, KYC, fraud protection, cybersecurity systems, strict privacy policy, self-exclusion functions, etc.

App.text: Currently, the casino and bookmaker does not offer the ability to install a mobile application. But the official website is mobile friendly due to the adapted design and HTML5 format.

Languages.text: The official website is available only with the English interface. There is no language switching function. But since the casino is focused on Canadian players, this cannot be considered a serious drawback.

Currencies.text: Players from Canada can use Canadian dollars (CAD) as a game currency. For players from other countries where this site is officially represented, currencies such as New Zealand dollars, US dollars, euros, etc. are available.
